title: Anatoliy Zhabchenko
text:
Anatoliy Serhiyovych Zhabchenko (, born 23 February 1979) is a <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Referee%20%28association%20football%29">referee</a>. He has been a full international for <a href="FIFA">FIFA</a> in 2013-2017.
Due to the <a href="2014%20Russian%20invasion%20of%20Ukraine">2014 Russian invasion of Ukraine</a> and annexation of Crimea, in 2014-2017 Zhabchenko represented the city of <a href="Khmelnytskyi%2C%20Ukraine">Khmelnytskyi</a>.
During the summer of 2019, Zhabchenko was appointed as a <a href="Referee%20%28association%20football%29">Referee</a> by the <a href="Russian%20Football%20Union">Russian Football Union</a>.
